citation.article-title: Caloramator mitchellensis sp. nov., a thermoanaerobe isolated from the geothermal waters of the Great Artesian Basin of Australia, and emended description of the genus Caloramator
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Caloramator proteoclasticus Tarlera et al. 1997
The description of Caloramator proteoclasticus (Tarlera et al., 1997) is emended as follows.
Vanadium(V), soluble Fe(III) citrate, amorphous Fe(III) oxyhydroxide and Mn(IV) are reduced in the presence of 0.2â€Š% yeast extract.
